TrbNetEntity.name: Readout
TrbNetEntity.description: Register of the trigger and read-out handler in full_endpoint (on front-ends only)

register.name: DataBufferStatus
register.description: Status of the event data buffers

field.name: DataFifoLevel
field.description: Fill level of the data Fifo in 32 Bit words

field.name: DataFifoEmpty
field.description: The data buffer is empty

field.name: DataFifoAlmostFull
field.description: The data buffer is almost full - no new events can be accepted

field.name: DataFifoFull
field.description: The data buffer is completly full. This must not happen.

field.name: DataFifoWrite
field.description: Data buffer write strobe.

field.name: DataHandlerState
field.description: State machine of the data handler

field.name: LengthFifoEmpty
field.description: The event header buffer is empty

field.name: LengthFifoAlmostFull
field.description: The event header buffer is almost full - no new events can be accepted

field.name: LengthFifoFull
field.description: The event header buffer is completly full. This must not happen.

field.name: LengthFifoWrite
field.description: Event header buffer write strobe.

register.name: Lvl1BufferStatus
register.description: Status of the event header buffers

field.name: Lvl1FifoLevel
field.description: Fill level of the Lvl1 Fifo in 32 Bit words

field.name: Lvl1FifoEmpty
field.description: The Lvl1 buffer is empty

field.name: Lvl1FifoAlmostFull
field.description: The Lvl1 buffer is almost full - no new events can be accepted

field.name: Lvl1FifoFull
field.description: The Lvl1 buffer is completly full. This must not happen.

field.name: Lvl1FifoWrite
field.description: Lvl1 buffer write strobe.

field.name: Lvl1HandlerState
field.description: State machine of the Lvl1 handler

register.name: Lvl1ReleaseStatus
register.description: Status of the individual data handlers. Bit is set if the handler did not get a release from the data handler. Content is only valid while the handler is not idle.

field.name: IPUHandlerStatusState
field.description: FSM state bits

field.name: EventNotFound
field.description: Error Flag - the event was not found

field.name: EventMissingData
field.description: Error Flag - the event has some missing data

field.name: ErrorSynchornization
field.description: Error Flag - the syncronization of buffers is not correct

field.name: ErrorNotConfigured
field.description: Error Flag - the FEE is not configured to comply with read-out requests
